OrgName: Advanced Sterilization Products, division of Ethicon, Inc.
activities: Advanced Sterilization Products receives personal information in various forms relating to personnel, including prospective and former employees.  These data are transferred from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland to the United States and are used to carry out the company's human resource functions. Advanced Sterilization Products receives and maintains from the EU/EEA and or Switzerland customer complaint/adverse event data.  Advanced Sterilization Products receives and maintains from the EU/EEA and or Switzerland customer business registration information and business associate registration information through ASP websites for marketing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources, Complaint Handling/Adverse Events, and Marketing
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (for human resources data); JAMs (for all other data)
